full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/13/2023 I have stocks and bonds with the following market value, as indicated on the attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. $ $ 80,000 I have life insurance in the sum of $ 100,000 With a cash surrender value of - I own real estate valued at $350,000 With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ 105,000 Which is located at 4807 Hill ST. LA CANADA CA 91011 (Street and Number (City) (State) (Zip Code) 8. Name Relationshin Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) Mr. PRAMUD TENDUIKAR BRUTHER Nov 1981. CASE# 86016119 (Complete this block only if the person named in item 3 will be in the United States temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend, to make specific contributions to the support of the person named in item 3. (If you check "do intend", indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room and board, state for how long and, if money, state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly, or for how long.) OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT I acknowledge at that I have read Part III of the Instructions, Sponsor and Alien Liability, and am aware of my responsibilities as an immigrant sponsor under the Social Security Act, as amended, and the Food Stamp Act, as amended. I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this affidavit signed by me and the statements are true and correct. Signature of deponent Sunesh chandra Punshottam Tendella 1/20/89 Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 20 day of JAnuary 1989 at PASAdent CA 2-8-91 My commission expires on Signature of Officer Administering Oath Georgette G Lemke Title notary If affidavit prepared by other than deponent, please complete the following: I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the deponent and is based on all information of which I have knowledge. OFFICIAL SEAL GEORGETTE G LEMKE NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA (Signature) (Address) LOS ANGELES COUNTY My comm. expires FEB 8, 1991 (Date)
